nodes.text: Takhal nuts were a type of nut that was edible by Humans and sometimes served roasted. Around 18 BBY, the Zeltron Dejah Duare purchased roasted takhal nuts and sweet ice for the Human Force-sensitive, Kajin Savaros, at a small bazaar on the Galactic Empire's capital planet of Coruscant.
Takhal nuts first appeared in Coruscant Nights III: Patterns of Force, a 2009 novel that was written by Michael Reaves with help from Maya Kaathryn Bohnhoff.
